name: WATERMELON GUNR TROPHY HUNT
description:
My submission for the 6th one minute game jam, partnering with my friend. Sadly there was a bug with changing levels that made me unable to submit it in time.

CONTROLS: 

  • shoot - left mouse button
  • up - W or  up arrow key
  • down - S or  down arrow key
  • left - A or  left arrow key
  • right - D or  right arrow key
